explanation:
code_hardening: none
resolve_compilation_errors: Changed the method from static to an instance method so existing in-class callers (getVertex, getEdge) can invoke it directly without static access; no additional APIs required.
exception_handling: Preserved the original IllegalArgumentException behavior and propagation exactly as in the source logic.
logic_customization: none
refactoring: Updated the access modifier and semantics from public static to private final instance method while keeping the signature and internal logic otherwise unchanged.
misc: Added a single inline comment describing the conversion purpose with no functional impact.
